title: 整合了一些有助于sponge优化的东西
author: JerryZRF
txt_content:
本帖最后由 JerryZRF 于 2019-11-25 19:21 编辑 

优化modhttps://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/surge/download/2665849优化mod（tps）
https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/tick-dynamic/download/2737879优化mod
https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/fastworkbench/download/2716379优化mod
https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/make-zoom-zoom/download/2588781优化（客户端）
https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/randompatches/download/2831330优化（客户端和服务端）
https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/clumps/download/2666198优化（服务端）
https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/ai-improvements/download/2450734优化（服务端）
https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/phosphor/download/2747710优化（服务端）
https://ore.spongepowered.org/Luck/spark/versions/1.3.0/download优化（服务端）
https://github.com/ustc-zzzz/OfflineServerUsernameWebRequestNetworkManager/releases/download/v0.1.0/OfflineServerUsernameWebRequestNetworkManager-0.1.0.jar优化（客户端和服务端）
https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/bithop/download/2552878

配置文件
server.properties
network-compression-threshold=512
max-tick-time=0
allow-flight=true
config\foamfix.cfg
B:optimizedBlockPos=false
B:patchChunkSerialization=false
config\sponge\global.conf
living-hard-despawn-range=80
realtime=true
tileentity-activation=true
async-lighting=false
eigen-redstone=true
tileentity-activation{
default-block-range=48
}
world {
auto-player-save-interval=6000
auto-save-interval=6000
chunk-unload-delay=15
deny-chunk-requests=true
flowing-lava-decay=true
pvp-enabled=true
view-distance=8
}
config\forge.cfg
B:disableVersionCheck=true
B:removeErroringEntities=true
B:removeErroringTileEntities=true
B:Global=false B:alwaysSetupTerrainOffThread=true
config\forgeChunkLoading.cfg
B:asyncChunkLoading=true


还请大佬指点不足之处

replies.author: 石叶尾猫
replies.txt_content: 海绵 真的不会用  等再成熟点再研究
